name: Love Each Other
description:
1. in This Game you have to Dodge some Balls and try to shoot there with bullets out of the Air. And not only that. the theme is keept simple and the atmosphere is romanticism.  the cooles thing about the game. is that if you finish a Wave of Balls your Partner has to handle with the rest of his Wave and the new one. that means that you have to Speak with each other to Win the game!!!

2. i tryed to theme get the Artstyle of the Game in a love theme. that means alot of Pink and Happy Colors. the theme Two fits with my game as well because you can´t play it alone you need a Friend.

3. Everything in this game is made by my self so no links needed.

A Big thanks. i loved this Gamejam and its the first one where i managed to finish a Game.
